author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Hey all!
I've been trying to onboard > 150 new testers today to help with testing around the merge.
For everyone who made it here: Welcome!
Just a small reminder that everytime you write a message here, hundreds of people will hear a "pling" in their living room, so please keep chatter to a minimum

I created an initial writeup of ideas to work on here: https://hackmd.io/WKpg6SNzQbi1jVKNgrSgWg#
And a document of how to connect to the current devnet here: https://hackmd.io/dFzKxB3ISWO8juUqPpJFfw
It would be great if client teams could add their instructions to the second document on how to join the devnet.
And if you have ideas for interesting test cases or things to work on, feel free to dm me or add them as comments to the first document.

author: ajsutton
content: Looks great.  I've added in Teku instructions.  I wonder if we need separate Linux & Mac sections. The instructions for both are identical except for how to install the JDK.

author: alexeirox
content:
i got two problems concerning connecting to the localhost testnet. if im not wrong about this 
1st i have to do everything this document says:
https://hackmd.io/dFzKxB3ISWO8juUqPpJFfw
which i did and everytime i tried to run the code: docker logs lighthouse_beacon -f --tail=20
i got this error: Failed to parse enr-address <IP> while im sure i followed all the steps one by one. 
my second problem is adding the local host which gives me this error: chainID invalid, are you sure about the rpc url. 
i'm running vscode on Macos 11.2.3

author: alexeirox
content: i checked my docker and dependencies, i'm good with that aspect. and i followed every step
